#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Scorecard.

= Description =

The Scorecard element collects information about the score(s) of the game of golf played.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

 # id - Unique identifer.

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

None.


== Structural Elements ==

The element has the following structural elements:

 # PlayedHole - Records details about the hole as played.


=== Element Details ===

==== PlayedHole ====

The PlayedHole element records information about the score of a game of golf and the strokes played.

The PlayedHole element has the following attributes:

 # number - Hole number played.

The PlayedHole element has the following structuring elements:

 # [score] - Record details about the score _after_ a hole is played.
 # [stroke] - Details about a stroke played for this hole.



= Notes =
